scripts.create-connector-configmap: kubectl delete configmap connector-config --ignore-not-found && kubectl create configmap connector-config --from-file ./connector-config/
scripts.create-config-configmap: kubectl delete configmap config --ignore-not-found && kubectl create configmap config --from-file ./kubernetes/config/
scripts.update-magda-postgres-chart: n=magda-postgres;echo "updating helm/internal-charts/$n...";rm -rf helm/internal-charts/$n/charts;helm dep up helm/internal-charts/$n
scripts.update-magda-internal-chart: yarn update-magda-postgres-chart;for n in $(ls helm/internal-charts); do echo "updating helm/internal-charts/$n...";rm -rf helm/internal-charts/$n/charts;helm dep up helm/internal-charts/$n; done;
scripts.update-magda-core-chart: yarn update-magda-internal-chart && helm dep up helm/magda-core
scripts.update-magda-chart: yarn update-magda-core-chart && helm dep up helm/magda
scripts.update-local-deployment-chart: yarn update-magda-chart && helm dep up helm/local-deployment && helm dep up helm/local-auth-test-deployment
scripts.add-all-chart-version-changes: git ls-files -m | grep Chart.yaml | xargs git add && git ls-files -m | grep Chart.lock | xargs git add && git ls-files -m | grep values.yaml | xargs git add
scripts.add-all-helm-docs-changes: yarn helm-docs && git ls-files -m | grep -i readme.md | xargs git add
scripts.version: yarn update-helm-chart-version && yarn update-all-charts && yarn add-all-chart-version-changes && yarn add-all-helm-docs-changes
